short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a window with customized size and position in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Window Opener is a practical Chrome extension that streamlines the process of opening and managing browser windows with customized sizes and positions. Designed for users who frequently access specific websites and prefer a well-organized screen, this extension offers convenient one-click functionality.

With Window Opener, users can add multiple windows and effortlessly choose one to open through the extension's popup menu. Each window's size and position can be customized to optimize the user's screen space and layout preferences. This tailored approach allows for an efficient and organized browsing experience, particularly for multitaskers and professionals who need to keep tabs on various websites simultaneously.

To further enhance usability, the extension also offers an option to configure a default window that opens directly upon clicking the action button. This feature is especially helpful for users who routinely access a particular site, providing a fast and seamless way to navigate to that destination.
